des: Managed 4+ plugins as a full-time on-call engineer, ensuring seamless operation and enhancing vendor satisfaction.Developed plugins for vendors using Remix JS and Polaris components. Integrated applications with the Shopify, enhancing vendor capabilities in 15% improvement performance

Served as a full-time on-call engineer, managing 2+ websites to ensure optimal performance and user experience. Designed and developed websites using Figma for design and JavaScript for implementation.

Served as a full-time on-call engineer with responsibilities in website management. Collaborated with design teams to create cohesive and functional web designs, achieving a 30% reduction in design-to-development time.
